\dEhehe!\d%K%P
\dAha-hahaha!\d%K%P
\dHahaha! Yes! Everything is going so well!\d%K%P
\dEverything is going my way! All according to\nplan!\d%K%P
\dI'll never stop laughing in glee! Ehehe! Hahaha!\d%K%P
\d...You done?\d%K%P
\dAll done! Nothing beats laughing out loud at the\ntop of your voice!\d%K%P
\dI'd be so restless if I didn't do it at least once\na day. Force of habit, I suppose.\d%K%P
It sounded like a joke, but I knew she was being\nserious.%K%P
Yukari had stopped hiding her fanatical tendencies\nafter my proclamation that I also loved that side\nof her.%K%P
\dYou must be the only thrill seeker in this world\ndaring enough to marry an obsessive Goddess like\nmyself.\d%K%P
\dYou're pretty self-aware, huh?\d%K%P
\dI have to say, you really have poor taste.\d%K%P
\dYou went with the flow and married three\nGoddesses, but look at us.\d%K%P
A Goddess of Misfortune, a former Tatarigami, and\na current Tatarigami who also happened to be quite\nextreme in her tastes.%K%P
\dIt happens when you fall in love.\d%K%P
I didn't know how to respond to her accusation of\npoor taste.%K%P
She bore some responsibility for getting me hooked\non her personality, didn't she?%K%P
\dYes, I'm what some of you might call a fanatic.\nBut it's not like the other two don't have their\nown darkness to contend with!\d%K%P
\dI think it's just you, Akira. They may not love\nyou as much as I do, but I can't deny they're not\nthat far behind...\d%K%P
\dHehehe! I might not be happy about that, but I'll\nnever relinquish my top spot in your heart!\d%K%P
\dErm, Yukari?\d%K%P
\dYou show too much affection to the others!\nEverywhere I turn, there's an aura of bliss.\d%K%P
Dark Jinriki started oozing out from Yukari's\nentire body.%K%P
I had hoped that she would be able to stop being a\nTatarigami, after everything we went through at\nthe shrine, but that didn't seem to be the case.%K%P
\dY-You've got it all wrong!\d%K%P
\dOh? So you never showed them affection?\d%K%P
\d...No, I did.\d%K%P
My goal to treat all three Goddesses equally hadn't\nchanged.%K%P
However, since they all needed different treatment,\nit wasn't exactly \dequal\d anymore.%K%P
\dYou're agitating my Tatari! Now you have to hug\nme real tight to calm it down!\d%K%P
\dFine, fine, come here.\d%K%P
\dHehehe!\d%K%P
As I brought her into my arms, the Tatari quickly\nfaded.%K%P
All that was left was for me to console Yukari.%K%P
\dI've really gotten used to this.\d%K%P
\dYou don't like holding me?\d%K%P
\dHow could I not like to hold my own adorable\nlittle wife?\d%K%P
\dYou're cute too, Akira.\d%K%P
\dSo cute I wish I could lick you up and down.\d%K%P
Ever since I had proposed to Yukari that night,\nwe'd been in honeymoon mode the entire time.%K%P
She'd cling to me when she found a chance to. Not\nthat I minded, of course. I even encouraged it.%K%P
\dYour lap pillow's ready!\d%K%P
She dragged me out to the porch and made me put\nmy head on her lap.%K%P
\dIt's so nice and warm out here! I know you're\nsleepy, so go ahead and take a nap!\d%K%P
\dOkay... I will, if I do start feeling sleepy.\d%K%P
In truth, I knew sleep would elude me.%K%P
I knew that Yukari wasn't planning on letting me\nsleep. She just wanted to enjoy flirting with me a\nlittle.%K%P
\dHehehe! Look at those cute ears!\d%K%P
\dHey, that tickles.\d%K%P
\dAww, stop squirming!\d%K%P
\dI will, if you stop tickling me!\d%K%P
\dBlame yourself for looking so prank-able!\d%K%P
Yukari was once again trying to make everything go\nher way with her unique way of doing things.%K%P
She had stopped trying to hide her true character\nand was instead showing it to all and sundry.%K%P
I had been right. Yukari had really been holding\nback previously.%K%P
\dWhere are Shion and Kaede?\d%K%P
I hadn't seen them for the past couple of hours.%K%P
\dThey went shopping.\d%K%P
\dI asked them to get some pretty heavy stuff, so\nthey won't be back any time soon.\d%K%P
\dThat means we can cuddle for as long as we like!\d%K%P
She really knew how to play her cards.%K%P
Coming up with all sorts of schemes to get the\nothers out of the picture, even when it wasn't\nnecessary anymore.%K%P
\dAre you mad?\d%K%P
\dNo.\d%K%P
I wouldn't have taken Yukari as my wife if\nsomething this trivial could make me angry.%K%P
\dI told you before I loved that part of you as\nwell, didn't I?\d%K%P
\dDid you now? I don't recall, actually. Do you\nthink you could say it again?\d%K%P
She was so transparent.%K%P
And she knew she was, too. She could be so\ndifficult to deal with sometimes.%K%P
But I was used to it, and even enjoyed it.%K%P
\d...I love your fanatically sweet side.\d%K%P
\dSorry? I couldn't hear you.\d%K%P
\dI love everything about you!\d%K%P
I shouted it out loud for everyone to hear.%K%P
\dOhhh, this is the best day of my life! My tears! I\ncan't control my tears!\d%K%P
\dIt's so nice to hear someone tell you they love\nyou!\d%K%P
\dThe impact of those words is like a blast of pure\npleasure.\d %K%P
This was the way Yukari liked her romance.%K%P
Nobody could rival her when it came to outright\npassion.%K%P
Some might consider this a burden, but not me. My\nresolve was firm.%K%P
\dI'll accept all the love you can throw at me.\d%K%P
\dI know I can count on you!\d%K%P
Loving someone like this meant having to face\nchallenges every day.%K%P
I'll admit, the odd anxiety I lived with was an\nacquired taste. But I was starting to like it.%K%P
\dYukari.\d%K%P
\dYes?\d%K%P
\dYou look happy.\d%K%P
\dI don't just look happy. I'm the happiest person\non this world right now.\d%K%P
\dThat's good to hear.\d%K%P
I hoped Yukari would always be here smiling beside\nme like this.%K%P
I knew that for both of us, the world would go\non to become a brighter and better place.%K%P
